bibl.title: Despatch from Thomas Brown to C.N. Korbright, May 1, 1874
Despatches from United States Consuls in Boma, 1888-1895
bibl.publisher: National Archives and Records Service General Services Administration

div1.ab: Consulate of the United States of America Bathurst 1 May 1874
div1.p: Sir, I have the honor to enclose for your Excellency's information copy of a letter, received today as this Consulate from Mr J.J. Rides an americcan citizen and consignee of the American bargne Jemie.
Bushman of Boston, in which he complains that, having paid the homage dues on this vessel in January last, for the whole of the year 1874 under the tonnage.
Ordinace (section 4) of the 18th April 1860 then in force he was yesterday called upon by the custom House authorities here, and compelled to pay (which he did under protest
div1.ab: To His Excellency C.N. Korbright Governor
div1.p: a second tonnage due, under the ordinance of the 31st March 1874 upon the same vessel, within the year, for which he has already paid.

Therefore other American vessels, that the Jennie Cashman have already paid the annual tonnage for the current year, and will on their return within the year, have the same cause of complaint I respectfully submit that there exists just and eqiuable reasons for seeking relief from your Excellency from this second payment by vessel that have already paid for was muh as the tonnage impesed under the 4th section of the ordinance of the 18th April 1860

was an annual charge which having been once paid gave vessels the right to enter all the year for which the payment was made free from a repetition of the charger it this became a lacit=agrement, between the Government + the faith of it chartered his vessel and made his engagements it is therefore hard upon him to pass on ordinance + to give it retrospective effect, tho it is not to expressed in the ordinance itself.

your Excellency's consideration of the case with high consideration
I have the honor to be Sir, Your obdt st Thomas Brown Acting Vice Consul for the United States of America
